Finnish: Myöhempien aikojen pyhien Jeesuksen Kristuksen kirkko
English: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
Hungarian: Utolsó Napi Szentek Jézus Krisztus Egyháza (mormonok)

English: (Each one has his own cross.) We all have our own problems to bear.
(Turn the other cheek.) To accept without retaliating when someone does you wrong.
(I walk in my home in Adam's outfit.) I walk around stark naked.
